## Notes

### Data

Census tract list from HUD

Two levels of prediction data:
1. census tract income, census tract population, census tract poverty %, (state income - census tract income)
2. all 16 SVI indicators pulled from ACS
3. all 16 SVI indicators pulled from ACS + within-state comparison to state's MHHI
